hero.title: Ottopia Portals
hero.subtitle: Summon your own Otto NFTs
hero.desc: Mint Otto Portal with Whitelist ticket, and summon your unique Otto NFTs. Otto? Lottie? Cleo? It’s all surprise!

checkWL.title: Check if you’re Whitelisted
checkWL.desc: Only the whitelisted accounts are qualified to mint Ottopia Portals at the Whitelist-only Sale. Connect wallet to see if you’re on the list!
checkWL.has-wl-desc: Get ready! Your Ottopia Portals will be able to mint at {{time}}
checkWL.no-wl-desc: Don’t worry. You can join your Discord, and prepare for the Public Sale at {{time}}.

intro.title: How do Ottopia Portals work?
intro.step1_desc: Otto portals can only be minted with Whitelist Tickets. One wallet can have multiple whitelist tickets. If you’re not sure you have whitelist tickets, please check in our Discord channel.
intro.step2_title: Mint Ottopia Portal with CLAM or ETH
intro.step2_desc:
We accept $CLAM and ETH for Ottopia Portal minting. However, we're offering a 30% discount when you pay with $CLAM. This is a simple way to save money while supporting the continued growth of the Otter Kingdom.

 Whitelist-Only Sale:
1 Portal = 0.06 ETH

Public Sale:
1 Portal = 0.08 ETH
intro.step3_title: Wait and take care of your Ottopia Portals
intro.step3_desc: Ottopia Portals need time to prepare the transmission, so be patient and take care of your Ottopia Portal(s) carefully.
intro.step4_desc:
When the time is up, you will be able to summon your Otto.

1 portal can only summon 1 Otto. The traits will be randomly generated the moment you summon a Otto. If you're lucky, you'll summon an Otto that possesses rare, or super rare traits that greatly increase your Otto's value.

mint.title: Mint Portal
mint.info_desc: A special portal that you can summon 1 Otto to the Otter Kingdom. Mint Portals and prepare for the Ottopian journey!
